attributes.action: Restore Hereditary Peers to the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Propose that Hereditary peers and restored to the House of Lords.

Hereditary peers will bring new ideas and scrutiny that otherwise wouldn't have happened.

rejection.details: The UK Youth Parliament has no record of you as a representative of their organisation. Therefore we can not accept your petition. If this is an error please contact Brendan McGowan from UKYP to discuss. His number is 02075539897.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
